title: Crown clothing
description: Crown Clothing is a responsive e-commerce web application where users can browse over several products, create and login into their own account, go through the payment process, and more.

title: WILD PIG TRACKER
description: Wild Pig Tracker is an interactive map that marks the location of your last encounter with a boar. Users can easily create a mark on this map by using their geolocation and they can read all the pre-existing information to take precautions.

title: Portfolio
description: My personal website to showcase my projects.

title: GOOGLE KEEP CLONE
description: This project is a clone of the front-end part of a Google keep. This application allows users to create, delete, archive, or simply mark a note as completed when the task is finished and more. Users also are free to choose their preferable theme.

title: Base Apparel
description: Base Apparel is the front end of a newsletter landing page where I developed an email verification.
